GRIDAWAREAURAS.EffectModeApplyOnOwnerTurnEnd: Apply on end of owner's turn
GRIDAWAREAURAS.EffectModeApplyOnOwnerTurnStart: Apply on start of owner's turn
GRIDAWAREAURAS.EffectModeApplyOnTargetTurnEnd: Apply on end of target's turn
GRIDAWAREAURAS.EffectModeApplyOnTargetTurnStart: Apply on start of target's turn
GRIDAWAREAURAS.EffectModeRemoveOnOwnerTurnEnd: Remove on end of owner's turn
GRIDAWAREAURAS.EffectModeRemoveOnOwnerTurnStart: Remove on start of owner's turn
GRIDAWAREAURAS.EffectModeRemoveOnTargetTurnEnd: Remove on end of target's turn
GRIDAWAREAURAS.EffectModeRemoveOnTargetTurnStart: Remove on start of target's turn
GRIDAWAREAURAS.InnerRadius.Hint: Size of the hole in the aura. Can also use actor/item properties as per 'Radius'.
GRIDAWAREAURAS.MacroModeOwnerTurnStartEnd: Start or end of owner's turn
GRIDAWAREAURAS.MacroModeTargetTurnStartEnd: Start or end of target's turn
GRIDAWAREAURAS.Position.Hint: Which corner of the token to align the aura to. This only applies to square grids. Choosing an option other than 'Center' will cause the aura to ignore the token's size.
GRIDAWAREAURAS.Radius.Hint: You can use properties from the actor/item by prefixing them with '@actor' or '@item' respectively. Type '@' to see a list of suggestions.
GRIDAWAREAURAS.UnresolvedRadiusConfigDialogWarning: Radius should be a number or a roll expression.
GRIDAWAREAURAS.UnresolvedRadiusTableWarning:
The property referenced by this aura ({path}) does not result in a number.

Please check the path and ensure you are using 'actor.' or 'item.' prefixes as appropriate.

SETTINGS.CustomAuraTargetFilters.Name: Custom Aura Target Filters
SETTINGS.CustomAuraTargetFilters.Hint: Create/edit custom filters which can be used when setting up automation for auras.
SETTINGS.CustomAuraTargetFilters.LongHint: Some Grid-Aware Aura features (such as effects) allow for setting a 'Token Filter' which determines which tokens can be affected by the aura. This utility allows you to define additional custom filters beyond the three that are provided built-in.
SETTINGS.CustomAuraTargetFilters.LongHintLink: See the documentation for more details.
SETTINGS.EnableEffectAutomation.Name: Enable Effect Automation
SETTINGS.EnableEffectAutomation.Hint: This will enable configuration options for auras to be able to automatically add or remove status effects from tokens when they enter/leave an aura. Note that this may require a GM user present to function correctly when the user that triggered the aura does not have ownership over an affected token.
SETTINGS.EnableMacroAutomation.Name: Enable Macro Automation
SETTINGS.EnableMacroAutomation.Hint: This will enable macros to be triggered by auras when tokens enter/leave their area. Note that by enabling this, it is possible for users to configure macros to be executed on other user's games. Make sure you understand the implications of this before turning this feature on.
SETTINGS.Presets.Name: Aura Presets
SETTINGS.Presets.Hint: Create/edit auras for easy reuse or to be added to tokens automatically.
SETTINGS.SquareGridMode.Name: Square Grid Mode
SETTINGS.SquareGridMode.Hint: Coordinate system to determine the shape of the aura when using square grids.
